column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I planned my office's holiday party and made a reservation at Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba for 12 people.  I worked with Alison and she was great!  I made small changes in the weeks before the event
column2: and even a few right up until the day before and she was very accommodating and easy to work with.  When we got to the restaurant
column3: we were seated even though the whole group had not shown up yet.  The server
column5: was on top of his game!  Because of the planning Alison and I had done beforehand
column6: he knew we had a few people in the group that needed Gluten Free options
column7: and he was very good about making sure they knew which items were GF-friendly.  I had previously set the menu with Alison
column8: and the tapas were brought out with perfect timing so that we always had something to much on.  I can't stress enough that this is a great place for a work event.  The food and atmosphere are great!  Thank you so much
